translation.outputPlaceholder: Translation results will be displayed here...

ocr.completed: Text recognition completed! Please click the translate button to proceed.
ocr.noTextFound: No text could be recognized. Please try using a clearer image.
ocr.uploadInstructions: Support drag & drop, click to select, or paste image (Ctrl/Cmd + V)
ocr.supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, WEBP | Max size: 10MB
ocr.recognitionTip: Tip: Supports mixed Chinese and English recognition. Recognition accuracy depends on image clarity and text size.
ocr.dropToRecognize: Drop to recognize text from image

settings.title: Settings
settings.customModelPlaceholder: Enter custom model ID, e.g.: gpt-4o-2024-08-06
settings.smartSwitchDesc: Automatically switch to English translation when inputting Chinese, and to Chinese translation when inputting English
settings.azureNote: Find the key in the Cognitive Services resource in Azure Portal
settings.ollamaNote: Local Ollama usually doesn't require an API key, you can leave it empty or enter any value
settings.securityNote: Note: Your API key will be securely stored in your local browser and will not be uploaded to any server.
settings.supportedServices: Supported services: OpenAI, Claude, Azure OpenAI, Ollama local deployment and other services compatible with OpenAI API format.
settings.smartSwitchDescription: Automatically switch to English translation when inputting Chinese, and to Chinese translation when inputting English

messages.apiKeyRequired: API key is not configured. Please click the settings button in the upper right corner to configure your API key before translation.
messages.testRequired: Please configure API key and URL first
messages.testSuccess: Connection test successful! API configuration is valid.
messages.invalidApiKey: Invalid API key, please check your key configuration
messages.rateLimited: Too many requests, please try again later
messages.accessDenied: API access denied, please check your permission configuration
messages.timeout: Connection timeout, please check network or API address
messages.networkError: Network connection failed, please check API address and network connection
messages.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported image format. Please use JPG, PNG or WEBP format.
messages.fileTooLarge: Image file is too large. Please select an image smaller than 10MB.

tts.autoDetectDescription: Automatically select appropriate voice based on text content

tts.notReady: Speech functionality is not ready yet

file.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported image format. Please use JPG, PNG or WEBP format.
file.fileTooLarge: Image file is too large. Please select an image smaller than 10MB.

translate.apiKeyRequired: AI translation requires API key configuration
translate.apiUrlRequired: AI translation requires API URL configuration
translate.invalidApiKey: Invalid API key, please check your key configuration
translate.rateLimited: Too many requests, please try again later
translate.accessDenied: API access denied, please check your permission configuration
translate.networkError: Network connection failed, please check API address and network connection

ocr.initFailed: OCR initialization failed, all CDNs are inaccessible
ocr.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported image format. Please use JPG, PNG or WEBP format.

ai.title: AI Translation Settings
ai.description: Configure AI translation behavior and smart features
ai.tip1: Smart language switch can automatically select the appropriate target language based on input content
ai.tip2: When Chinese input is detected, it will automatically switch to English translation
ai.tip3: When English input is detected, it will automatically switch to Chinese translation

api.title: API Configuration
api.description: Configure AI service providers and API keys

voice.title: Voice Settings
voice.tip1: Voice functionality is based on the browser's built-in Web Speech API
voice.tip2: Different browsers may support different numbers and qualities of voices
voice.tip3: Auto language detection can select appropriate voice based on text content
voice.tip4: You can preview current voice settings using the test button

tts.notSupported: Browser doesn't support Web Speech API

ocr.tryingCdn: Trying to initialize OCR using CDN...
